title: HDR is not working properly on Pixel 4
content:
I can't find any information on the issue with HDR content playback on the Pixel 4. I only found a couple of themes on the reddit and there is no cause for the issue. Maybe someone heard something why HDR10 does not work on the flagship device from Google? The problem manifests itself in the fact that when playing HDR video, the colors are normal or even paler than in SDR, but if you rotate the orientation or press / hold the gesture bar, then the colors become correct for HDR. What it is?
Sample: https://youtube.com/shorts/Er82WDkfCNQ?feature=share
